body.name: Universal Airplane Phone Holder Travel Essentials, Hands-free Phone Mount in Flight with Flexible Rotation, Airplane Phone Mount for Air Travel, Travel Must Haves Phone Stand Desk, Tray Table, Pink
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 11 hrs 57 mins
features: Hands-Free Viewing: The flight phone mount allows you to attach your phone to the seatback tray table, so you can enjoy hands-free viewing of your favorite shows, movies, or games during a long flight.

Adjustable : This phone mount is compatible with a variety of phone sizes, from an iPhone mini to an iPhone 14 Pro Max or Samsung Note 20 Plus, so you can take it with you on all your vacations, and it features an adjustable clamp design that securely holds your device in place, regardless of its size or model.
Easy to Install: The mount is easy to install and remove, requiring no special tools or extra equipment. Also, it does not damage the airplane tray table or leave any residue.

Ideal for Travel: The compact and lightweight design makes our flight phone mount an ideal travel companion. In addition to using it on a plane, it is also perfect for use in a car, on a train, or even on a golf cart.

Security: The Airplane Phone Holder features a secure locking mechanism that keeps your device in place during turbulence or sudden movements. This ensures that your phone remains safe and undamaged while you enjoy your flight.
body.description: Trusted by 100,000+ travelers, this versatile and functional travel essential makes an excellent gift for friends, family, or coworkers. They'll love it! The strong mount securely clamps your phone to a table, luggage handle, gym equipment, or any object up to 1.5 inches wide, making it the perfect travel accessory for airplane travel. With dual joints and 360-degree rotation, you can adjust to the perfect viewing angle, whether you prefer it vertically or horizontally. This travel phone holder is compatible with a variety of phone sizes, from an iPhone 15，15 Plus,15 pro,15 pro max，14, 14 Plus,14 pro,14 pro max, 13, 13 Pro, 13 Pro Max, 12, 12 Pro, 12 Pro Max, 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max to an mini SE, XS, XS Max, XR, X or Galaxy S22 Ultra, S21, S20, Google Pixel etc, so you can take it with you on all your vacations. It easily fits in your pocket, making it a convenient addition to your travel essentials kit. We're dedicated to providing quality products and exceptional customer service. If you have any issues, we'd be happy to help resolve them. Enjoy discovering all the fun ways you can use this handy gadget on your next vacation!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WORKS PERFECTLY! Love this phone mount, especially on flights
reviews.reviewText: This mount has multiple uses but love using it during airplane flights to hold my phone on seat back in front of me so I can watch TV / movies without holding. It folds up so small. LOVE IT. Bought 2 more for my kids

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love this product
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about this product. It’s easy to use with all airline seats. It’s easy to store in my travel bag and the ease of use is great. I will buy more for gifts. Thanks for making such a great product. 🥰

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The installation is very fast, the product quality is particularly good, and the packaging is advanced

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worked as expected!
reviews.reviewText: These do not seem like the most durable devices, but for the price I think it is spot on. It worked perfectly on the tray table on one flight, but the return flight had thinner tray tables and this did not clamp closed enough to create tension to hold in place. I was able to stick my external battery against the tray table and clamp it around both so it became snug enough. An adapter piece or foam block included would be great for this problem and as long as a person handles with reasonable care, should last quite a while. It’s great that it folds up so compact and easy to store away after the flight. It could easily work in other areas and modes of transportation too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my spouse to use during work travel. Works great and keeps the phone in place for her to watch shows and movies on the plane
